user.title: Evolution API Configuration
user.description:
Enter your Evolution API connection details. You can find these in your Evolution API dashboard.

[Evolution API Documentation]({docs_url})

data_description.server_url: The base URL of your Evolution API server (e.g., https://your-server.com)
data_description.instance_id: The unique identifier for your WhatsApp instance
data_description.verify_ssl: Enable SSL certificate verification (recommended for production)

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the Evolution API server. Please check the server URL.
error.invalid_auth: Invalid API key. Please check your credentials.
error.instance_not_connected: The WhatsApp instance is not connected. Please scan the QR code in Evolution API dashboard.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please check the logs for more details.

abort.already_configured: This Evolution API instance is already configured.

init.title: Evolution API Options
init.description: Update your Evolution API connection settings.

send_text.name: Send Text Message
send_text.description: Send a WhatsApp text message to a phone number or group.

phone_number.name: Phone Number
phone_number.description: Recipient's phone number with country code (e.g., +1234567890). Leave empty if sending to a group.

group_id.name: Group
group_id.description: Group JID to send to (e.g., 123456789@g.us). Leave empty if sending to a phone number.

message.name: Message
message.description: Text message to send. Supports emojis and multi-line messages.

delay.name: Delay (ms)
delay.description: Optional typing delay before sending (in milliseconds).

link_preview.name: Show Link Preview
link_preview.description: Display a card preview if the message contains a URL.

mention_all.name: Mention Everyone
mention_all.description: Mention all participants (only works in group chats).

send_media.name: Send Media
send_media.description: Send an image, video, or document via WhatsApp.

phone_number.name: Phone Number
phone_number.description: Recipient's phone number with country code. Leave empty if sending to a group.

group_id.name: Group
group_id.description: Group JID to send to (e.g., 123456789@g.us). Leave empty if sending to a phone number.

media_url.name: Media URL
media_url.description: URL to the media file or base64 encoded content.

media_type.name: Media Type
media_type.description: Type of media to send (image, video, or document).

caption.name: Caption
caption.description: Optional caption text shown with the media.

delay.name: Delay (ms)
delay.description: Optional wait time before sending (in milliseconds).

send_audio.name: Send Audio
send_audio.description: Send a voice note or audio file via WhatsApp.

phone_number.name: Phone Number
phone_number.description: Recipient's phone number with country code. Leave empty if sending to a group.

group_id.name: Group
group_id.description: Group JID to send to (e.g., 123456789@g.us). Leave empty if sending to a phone number.

audio_url.name: Audio URL
audio_url.description: URL to the audio file or base64 encoded content.

delay.name: Delay (ms)
delay.description: Optional wait time before sending (in milliseconds).

phone_number.name: Phone Number
phone_number.description: Recipient's phone number with country code. Leave empty if sending to a group.

group_id.name: Group
group_id.description: Group JID to send to (e.g., 123456789@g.us). Leave empty if sending to a phone number.

sticker_url.name: Sticker URL
sticker_url.description: URL to the sticker (WebP) or base64 encoded content.

delay.name: Delay (ms)
delay.description: Optional wait time before sending (in milliseconds).

send_location.name: Send Location
send_location.description: Share a location pin via WhatsApp.

phone_number.name: Phone Number
phone_number.description: Recipient's phone number with country code. Leave empty if sending to a group.

group_id.name: Group
group_id.description: Group JID to send to (e.g., 123456789@g.us). Leave empty if sending to a phone number.

delay.name: Delay (ms)
delay.description: Optional wait time before sending (in milliseconds).

send_contact.name: Send Contact Card
send_contact.description: Share a contact card (vCard) via WhatsApp.

phone_number.name: Phone Number
phone_number.description: Recipient's phone number with country code. Leave empty if sending to a group.

group_id.name: Group
group_id.description: Group JID to send to (e.g., 123456789@g.us). Leave empty if sending to a phone number.

contact_name.name: Contact Name
contact_name.description: Full name of the contact to share.

send_reaction.name: Send Reaction
send_reaction.description: React to a message with an emoji.

phone_number.name: Phone Number
phone_number.description: Chat phone number with country code. Leave empty if reacting in a group.

group_id.name: Group
group_id.description: Group JID where the message is. Leave empty if reacting in a private chat.

message_id.name: Message ID
message_id.description: Unique ID of the message to react to.

reaction.name: Reaction Emoji
reaction.description: Emoji to react with. Leave empty to remove reaction.

send_poll.name: Send Poll
send_poll.description: Create and send a poll to gather opinions via WhatsApp.

phone_number.name: Phone Number
phone_number.description: Recipient's phone number with country code. Leave empty if sending to a group.

group_id.name: Group
group_id.description: Group JID to send to (e.g., 123456789@g.us). Polls work best in groups.

poll_name.name: Poll Question
poll_name.description: Question or title of the poll.

poll_options.name: Poll Options
poll_options.description: Comma-separated list of options (e.g., Red, Blue, Green).

max_selections.name: Max Selections
max_selections.description: Maximum number of options each user can select.

delay.name: Delay (ms)
delay.description: Optional wait time before sending (in milliseconds).

check_number.name: Check WhatsApp Number
check_number.description: Verify if a phone number is registered on WhatsApp.

phone_number.name: Phone Number
phone_number.description: Phone number to check (with country code).

refresh_groups.name: Refresh Groups List
refresh_groups.description: Fetch the latest WhatsApp groups. Results are stored in the Groups sensor.
